handover.title: Handovers
handover.confirm_desc: Make sure you have reviewed notes & attachments. This action marks the handover as confirmed by you.
handover.confirm_note_prefix: After confirmation, you can still file a dispute via admin if needed, but the initial status will be
handover.dispute_desc: Explain the reason for your dispute.
handover.dispute_placeholder: Example: there is damage that has not been recorded
handover.dispute_hint: Write the reason briefly and clearly (min. 5 characters).

stop.title: Disable Auto-Renew
stop.desc: Are you sure you want to disable auto-renew for this contract? If disabled, it will not be automatically renewed after it ends. To re-enable auto-renew, please contact the admin.
stop.confirm_ack: I have read and understand the information above.

notice.title: Things to note:
notice.no_guarantee: No guarantee of renewal if the room has been booked by another tenant.
notice.forfeit_now: Since it is less than {{days}} days before the end date, your deposit will be forfeited as per policy.
notice.forfeit_cond: If stopping less than {{days}} days before the end date, the deposit will be forfeited as per policy.
